marytts.unitselection.weightingfunctions

Class WeightFunctionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.unitselection.weightingfunctions.WeightFunctionManager

  • public class WeightFunctionManager
extends Object
    This class connects weighting function names with the actual instances of the weighting functions.

    sacha
